title: Indian troops launch CASO in Srinagar
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 25 (APP):In Indian Occupied Kashmir, Indian troops have launched a cordon and search operation in Ranbirgarh area in the outskirts of Srinagar.
According to Kashmir Media Service, the troops cordoned off Ranbirgarh area in early Saturday morning and launched searches. The troops have sealed all entry and exit points of the area. The operation continued till last reports came in.
Earlier, an Indian soldier was injured in an attack in the same area. Further details are awaited.
